mapper.delete: WITH activity_flag AS (SELECT t1.* FROM act_ru_actinst t1 WHERE t1.proc_inst_id_ = #{processInstanceId} AND t1.act_id_ = #{activityInstanceId} ORDER BY t1.end_time_ ASC) DELETE FROM act_ru_actinst ara USING activity_flag af WHERE ara.proc_inst_id_ = af.proc_inst_id_ AND ( ara.end_time_ > af.end_time_ OR ara.end_time_ IS NULL)
